Documentation: Is the unique identification of a client.
The inbound delivery number is part of the unique identifier of the inbound delivery.
The associated line of the initial system partner telegram. If a delivery line is added within WAMAS, then this number is set to 0.
Is the unique identification of a client.
Is a part of the unique identification of a text type.

A long value used for attributes, which specify a sequence used for ordering or sorting (see guideline "Rules and Recommendations for the Data Model"). Is not related with an Oracle sequence, which is represented by the IDENTIFIER model element.
The text that text template or multi language text of text types for various processes holds.
